pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Methods to Estimate the Proportion of Liars in Coin Flip Experiments // Implements Bayesian methods, described in Hugh- Jones (2019) doi:10.1007/s40881-019-00069-x, for estimating the proportion of liars in coin flip-style experiments, where subjects report a random outcome and are paid for reporting a "good" outcome.
